Name: Let's Learn Japanese! Hiragana
About the game: Want to learn to read Japanese? Let's start with Hiragana! This game teaches you all the characters of the hiragana alphabet, as well as their variations and combinations. You'll practice each character by playing fun mini-games, and you'll be reading Japanese before you know it.
